command.weaponmaster.setability: 添加 %s 技能到 %s 的武器
command.weaponmaster.setpart: 添加 %s 的 %s 部件到 %s
gui.weaponmaster.page1_0: 别担心，这本指南很简洁（哈哈）
gui.weaponmaster.page1_1: 正如你所猜想的，你需要两样东西来开始武器改装
gui.weaponmaster.page1_5: 您将使用它兑换您的武器选择以及升级/定制。
gui.weaponmaster.page1_6: 制作或在下方查阅它，或从朋友那里偷取。 你的背包平衡可能会发生变化。
gui.weaponmaster.page2_0: 要选择你的武器，请制作一个武器套件并右键点击打开选择菜单。
gui.weaponmaster.page2_5: 这些被分为敏捷和超重、横扫和精密
gui.weaponmaster.page2_6: 所有武器都使用独特的命中检测，横扫总是在扇形挥砍，造成全面伤害。精准打击只能直击前方，但会穿透并造成更多伤害。
gui.weaponmaster.page2_7: 敏捷武器有很高的挥砍速度，然后超重会造成更多的伤害以及更远的攻击范围。
gui.weaponmaster.page2_8: 阔剑是敏捷型武器，用于可靠的控制。
gui.weaponmaster.page2_9: 轻剑是敏捷型武器，用于快速迅捷的爆发式攻击。
gui.weaponmaster.page3_0: 巨镰是超重型的武器，可以攻击大量敌人造成爆炸性的伤害。
gui.weaponmaster.page3_1: 长柄武器是超重型精密武器，用来杀死一个人和他身后的每一个人。
gui.weaponmaster.page3_2: 在早期选择一些你能够坚持的东西是相当重要的，如下所示
gui.weaponmaster.page3_3: 一旦你拥有了它，首先他会是破损的。拿去工作站维修吧。任何时候，它“破损”，你都可以再次这样做。
gui.weaponmaster.page3_9: 在配置界面中使用此放射状表盘选择子菜单以编辑和选择各种武器特性。
gui.weaponmaster.page4_0: 在此处预览未确认的部分
gui.weaponmaster.page4_5: 你的物品不能附魔，但可以升级。选择想要增强的等级栏，它的等级将随着使用而提升。
gui.weaponmaster.page5_0: 当你填充一个等级栏时，如武器工具提示HUD中所示，等级计数器会递增，下次打开配置界面时，解锁菜单会打开。
gui.weaponmaster.page5_1: 你每次升级都会得到一个随机增强
gui.weaponmaster.page5_2: 每件武器的技能! 稍后详细介绍。
gui.weaponmaster.page5_3: 尽管有部分蓝图，但你仍需永久地记得如何应用它们。以免你不知怎么弄丢了武器，或者想升级你倒霉朋友的物品。
gui.weaponmaster.page5_4: 每个等级，你可以选择一个技能解锁和三个部件解锁。
gui.weaponmaster.page6_0: 修理你的武器是“免费”资源，但会花费你一些时间。
gui.weaponmaster.page6_1: 用高砂抛光剂将其完全覆盖，用适当的压力擦拭干净，然后翻转并重复。
gui.weaponmaster.page6_2: 如果你把所有东西都弄好了，你会看到它散发光芒。
gui.weaponmaster.page7_0: 技能是定制你战斗方式的极其强大的手段。
gui.weaponmaster.page7_1: 在“技能”选项卡中选择并确认，然后通过按鼠标右键来使用它们。
gui.weaponmaster.page7_2: 技能是基于类似类型的冷却
gui.weaponmaster.page7_3: 你可以将不同的能力链接在一起，但它们会叠加它们的冷却效果！
gui.weaponmaster.page7_4: 它们的用途非常多样，所以当你解锁的时候可以进行实验。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_0: - 你在持有武器时死亡（除非配置文件另有说明）否则他将完全损坏。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_1: - 一旦你的等级在工具提示HUD中显示为绿色，它将不会在从等级中获得更多的增益。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_2: - 无论怎样，你可以继续升级来获得声望，并继续解锁。声望就是炫耀1 星-10 星等级。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_3: - 如果你总是笨手笨脚的，请更改你的投掷绑定，这样你就不会丢去你的武器（笑死了）。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_4: - 将您的工作站放置在一个方块上，以显示其布料层。
gui.weaponmaster.page8_5: - 随着时间的推移，XP 曲线使其收益变低。改变你的增强属性！
gui.weaponmaster.page8_6: - 如果你在PVP包中使用这个mod，我建议你在下次遭遇战中向上帝祈求宽恕。
gui.weaponmaster.page9_1: ForsetCabiri: 艺术、设计、宣传/页面和概念。
gui.weaponmaster.page9_2: DesianSkies: 代码，执行，附加概念和痛苦。
advancements.weaponmaster.root.title: 部件
ability.weaponmaster.onrush.name: 冲锋
ability.weaponmaster.onrush.desc: 冲向前方，向任意物体发起冲击，击中时重置充能时间。
ability.weaponmaster.gravity_well.name: 重力井
ability.weaponmaster.gravity_well.desc: 暂停一个投射物。挥舞可恢复它，对着准星。可以暂停许多。
ability.weaponmaster.landmine.name: 全息地雷
ability.weaponmaster.landmine.desc: 放下地雷，当敌人或投射物靠近时引爆。
ability.weaponmaster.gunpowder_whip.name: 引信鞭
ability.weaponmaster.gunpowder_whip.desc: 将一个目标拉入，如果它或者你着火了，剩下的火焰伤害将立即引爆。
ability.weaponmaster.backpedal.name: 躲闪
ability.weaponmaster.backpedal.desc: 快速后退。如果角度正确，则可以发动。
ability.weaponmaster.buster.name: 克星
ability.weaponmaster.buster.desc: 跳到你头顶的目标上，抓住并消灭它们。
ability.weaponmaster.buster.confession: Hello there fel低 dev! Desian here. You're either reading this making an addon mod (I'm sorry) or making a resource pack (I'm *really* sorry). Either way, I'm not here to help you! (again, sorry). But look, I need to tell you about something about buster. Originally, what would eventually become resist and smokescreen was a collection of single potion effect abilities, labelled pot_resist, post_speed and pot_invis. Now, obviously, being the funny jokester I am, I also made a pot_buster. It didn't *do* anything but it was very funny for a bit. Now, like any self-respecting programmer I don't know when to drop a joke, so it got a really basic implementation, you literally just jumped up and anyone you hit got knocked down. It sucked and I fully intended to remove it. Anyway, a lot of things got shuffled around during testing, including the removal of the pot_ abilities in favour of the more flavourful variants we have now. This brought a little too much attention to buster and insted of doing the smart thing of going 'yeah gimme a sec i'll remove that' I went along with Forset and actually remade it into a proper ability! This took weeks! It ***STILL*** has netcode issues! Anyway, absolutely no part of the original joke exists in the final build otherwise so I kinda felt like I *needed* to document it in some form, y'know?
ability.weaponmaster.buster.confession.2: Hi dev. Forset here. Yeah, unfortunately that one's my fault. Honestly, I just really want to see a video of someone using this ability on another player if the mod spreads around into enough packs. That's kind of my only motivation and that I thought it was a hilarious anti-air. Unlike Desian, I am not sorry.
ability.weaponmaster.buster.confession.3: Desian again, do want to clarify that nether of us consulted the other when adding these to the lang file, i'm pretty sure we're just doing a bit here at this point.
ability.weaponmaster.dash.name: 冲刺
ability.weaponmaster.dash.desc: 基于你当前的运动状态极快地定向冲刺后停下。
ability.weaponmaster.doubleslash.name: 双向劈砍
ability.weaponmaster.doubleslash.desc: 一个快速的斜砍和竖劈甚至没有1 帧。
ability.weaponmaster.explode.name: 爆破
ability.weaponmaster.explode.desc: 爆炸！即时引爆自我！破坏物品但是不破坏方块。
ability.weaponmaster.levitate.name: 漂浮
ability.weaponmaster.levitate.desc: 立即漂浮到空中并获得高级的运动控制。
ability.weaponmaster.lunge.name: 腾跃
ability.weaponmaster.lunge.desc: 朝着你面朝的方向跳跃一段距离。账户推进。
ability.weaponmaster.none.name: 无
ability.weaponmaster.parry.name: 招架
ability.weaponmaster.parry.desc: 时机恰好时可以阻挡伤害并获得后续的buff。
ability.weaponmaster.phantool.name: 潘多拉工具
ability.weaponmaster.phantool.desc: 转换为高速多功能工具，但会严重消耗耐久度。
ability.weaponmaster.pilk.name: 净化
ability.weaponmaster.pilk.desc: 清除所有状态，并根据其严重程度进行一波反击。
ability.weaponmaster.resist.name: 忍耐
ability.weaponmaster.resist.desc: 短暂获得高伤害减免，并减速附近的其他人。
ability.weaponmaster.rewind.name: 回放
ability.weaponmaster.rewind.desc: 回放你的最后几秒钟，或者反过来回到安全状态。
ability.weaponmaster.smokescreen.name: 烟幕
ability.weaponmaster.smokescreen.desc: 激活时短暂隐形并大大提高速度。

part.rapier_guard_dice.name: 装配 剑柄
part.rapier_guard_dice.confession: Hello! Desian again! This 刀柄 has a great story attached to it. Ok so, I'm assuming you know what psudorandom numbers are. Well, for a time our creative tab had this weird problem where the 刀柄 of the rapiers would not change for like 20 different generations and Forset's submitting this bug report to me utterly confused. I, of course, recognise this immediately and correctly just go 'yeah maths sucks like that sometimes, we can do literally anything to fix this' so like, *obviously* I do the silliest thing and dedicate an entire new 刀柄 to fixing this one in a million bug that could've been fixed way 简易r with like, a single line of code. Hence, the rigged dice (it is actually rigged! I'm very proud of it.).
